mapper.select:
SELECT date_format(BAS.F12506, "%Y.%m.%d") F12506 /*입회일자*/ ,BAS.F16013 /*단축코드*/ ,BAS.F16002 /*한글종목명*/ ,BAS.F15009 /*시가*/ ,BAS.F15010 /*고가*/ ,BAS.F15011 /*저가*/ ,BAS.F15001 /*현재가*/ ,BAS.F15007 /*기준가*/ ,BAS.F15015 /*거래량*/ ,BAS.F15023 /*거래대금*/ ,BAS.F15472 /*대비*/ ,BAS.F15004 /*등락율*/ ,BAS.F15006 /*등락구분(1:상한/2:상승/3:보합/4:하한/5:하락/6:기세상한/7:기세상승/8:기세하한/9:기세하락)*/ ,BAS.F15028 /*시가총액*/ ,BAS.LARGE_TYPE /*지수대분류(FNGUIDE, KRX, KIS, KAP)*/ ,BAS.MIDDLE_TYPE /*지수중분류(FNGUIDE, WISEFN)*/ ,BAS.MARKET_ID /*시장 ID*/ ,BAS.STD_INDEX /*기준지수*/ ,date_format(BAS.STD_DATE, "%Y.%m.%d") STD_DATE /*기준일*/ ,date_format(BAS.ANNO_DATE, "%Y.%m.%d") ANNO_DATE /*발표일*/ ,BAS.INDEX_CAL_METHOD /*지수산출방식*/ ,BAS.STD_CAPITAL /*기준시가총액*/ ,BAS.FIXED_CASH /*고정현금*/ ,BAS.FLOWRATE_YN /*유동비율적용여부*/ ,BAS.INDEX_COMMENT /*설명*/ ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM tm_jisu_share_req WHERE inst_cd = #{inst_cd} AND jisu_id = #{jisu_cd} AND req_flag = '2') REQCNT /* 지수 공개여부(카운트가 1이상이면 공개) */ FROM td_index_basic BAS WHERE BAS.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} and BAS.MARKET_ID = #{market_id}
AND BAS.large_type = #{large_type}

choose.when: SELECT /* date_format(CONCAT(INDX.trd_dd, INDX.trd_hh), '%Y,%m,%d,%H,%i,%s') trd_dd */ date_format( INDX.trd_dd, '%Y.%m.%d' ) trd_dd ,date_format( CONCAT( INDX.trd_dd, SUBSTR( INDX.trd_hh, 1, 6 ) ), '%H:%i:%s' ) trd_hh ,IFNULL(INDX.close_idx,0) close_idx ,IFNULL(ETP.etp_close_idx, 0) etp_close_idx ,INDX.INDEX_NM ,ETP.ETP_NM FROM(SELECT B.F20044 as trd_dd ,lpad(B.F20004,8, '0') AS trd_hh ,B.F20008 as close_idx ,0 as etp_close_idx ,A.F16002 as INDEX_NM FROM td_index_basic A, td_index_intra B WHERE A.F16013 = B.F16013 AND A.MARKET_ID = B.MARKET_ID AND A.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} AND A.MARKET_ID = #{market_id} ) INDX Left outer Join (select hist.F20044 as trd_dd ,LPAD(hist.F20004,8, '0') AS trd_hh ,0 as close_idx ,hist.F20008 as etp_close_idx ,base.F16002 ETP_NM from (select a.F15028, a.F16012, a.F16013, a.F16002 FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic a WHERE a.F34239 = CAST(SUBSTR(#{market_id}, 2) AS SIGNED) AND a.F16257 = #{jisu_cd} AND a.F15028 = (select max(a.F15028) FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic a WHERE a.F34239 = CAST(SUBSTR(#{market_id}, 2) AS SIGNED) AND a.F16257 = #{jisu_cd}) ) base inner join kc_etp.td_index_intra hist on base.F16013 = hist.F16013) ETP on INDX.trd_dd = ETP.trd_dd
choose.otherwise: SELECT /* date_format(INDX.trd_dd, '%Y,%m,%d,%H,%i,%s') trd_dd */ date_format( INDX.trd_dd, '%Y.%m.%d' ) trd_dd ,IFNULL(INDX.close_idx,0) close_idx ,IFNULL(ETP.etp_close_idx, 0) etp_close_idx ,INDX.INDEX_NM, ETP.ETP_NM FROM(SELECT B.F12506 as trd_dd ,B.F15001 as close_idx ,0 as etp_close_idx ,A.F16002 as INDEX_NM FROM td_index_basic A, td_index_hist B WHERE A.F16013 = B.F16013 AND A.MARKET_ID = B.MARKET_ID AND A.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} AND A.MARKET_ID = #{market_id} ) INDX Left outer Join (select hist.F12506 as trd_dd ,0 as close_idx ,hist.F15001 as etp_close_idx ,base.F16002 ETP_NM from (select a.F15028, a.F16012, a.F16013, a.F16002 FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic a WHERE a.F34239 = CAST(substr(#{market_id}, 2) AS SIGNED) AND a.F16257 = #{jisu_cd} AND a.F15028 = (select max(a.F15028) FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic a WHERE a.F34239 = CAST(SUBSTR(#{market_id}, 2) AS SIGNED) AND a.F16257 = #{jisu_cd}) ) base inner join kc_etp.td_etp_hist hist on base.F16013 = hist.F16013) ETP on INDX.trd_dd = ETP.trd_dd

mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic base WHERE base.F34239 = CAST(substr(#{market_id}, 2) AS SIGNED) AND base.F16257 = #{jisu_cd}

SELECT ITEM.ISIN_CODE , ITEM.JONG_NM , ROUND((ITEM.ITEM_AMT/TOT_ITEM.TOT_AMT * 100), 2) AS PERCNT , ITEM.GUBUN /* 종목별 시가 총액*/ FROM(SELECT MAP.ISIN_CODE ,MAP.F16002 JONG_NM ,(COMP.F03003 * COMP.F30812 * COMP.F30813 * COMP.MAP.CEILING_PERCNT * MAP.STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT) ITEM_AMT ,MAP.GUBUN FROM (SELECT F12506 , ISIN_CODE , UP_CODE , CEILING_PERCNT , STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT , GUBUN , F16002 FROM (SELECT A.F12506 , A.ISIN_CODE , A.UP_CODE , A.CEILING_PERCNT , A.STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT , A.GUBUN , B.F16002 FROM m168uidxmap A INNER JOIN td_kspjong_basic B ON A.ISIN_CODE = B.F16012 WHERE UP_CODE = CONCAT(IF(substr(#{jisu_cd}, 1, 2) = '60', 'MFI', 'WFN'), substr(#{jisu_cd}, 3)) ORDER BY A.ISIN_CODE, A.F12506 DESC ) a WHERE a.F12506 = (SELECT MAX(AA.F12506) /* 최근 일자 */ FROM m168uidxmap AA INNER JOIN td_kspjong_basic BB ON AA.ISIN_CODE = BB.F16012 WHERE AA.UP_CODE = CONCAT(IF(substr(#{jisu_cd}, 1, 2) = '60', 'MFI', 'WFN'), substr(#{jisu_cd}, 3))) ) MAP INNER JOIN m168uidxcomp COMP ON MAP.F12506 = COMP.F12506 AND MAP.ISIN_CODE = COMP.F16013 AND MAP.GUBUN = COMP.GUBUN) ITEM /* 지수에 속한 전체 종목 시가 총액 */ INNER JOIN (SELECT SUM((COMP.F03003 * COMP.F30812 * COMP.F30813 * COMP.MAP.CEILING_PERCNT * MAP.STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT)) TOT_AMT FROM (SELECT F12506 , ISIN_CODE , UP_CODE , CEILING_PERCNT , STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT , GUBUN , F16002 FROM (SELECT A.F12506 , A.ISIN_CODE , A.UP_CODE , A.CEILING_PERCNT , A.STYLE_INCLUD_PERCNT , A.GUBUN , B.F16002 FROM m168uidxmap A INNER JOIN td_kspjong_basic B ON A.ISIN_CODE = B.F16012 WHERE UP_CODE = CONCAT(IF(substr(#{jisu_cd}, 1, 2) = '60', 'MFI', 'WFN'), substr(#{jisu_cd}, 3)) ORDER BY A.ISIN_CODE, A.F12506 DESC ) a WHERE a.F12506 = (SELECT MAX(AA.F12506) /* 최근 일자 */ FROM m168uidxmap AA INNER JOIN td_kspjong_basic BB ON AA.ISIN_CODE = BB.F16012 WHERE AA.UP_CODE = CONCAT(IF(substr(#{jisu_cd}, 1, 2) = '60', 'MFI', 'WFN'), substr(#{jisu_cd}, 3))) ) MAP INNER JOIN m168uidxcomp COMP ON MAP.F12506 = COMP.F12506 AND MAP.ISIN_CODE = COMP.F16013 AND MAP.GUBUN = COMP.GUBUN) TOT_ITEM order by ITEM.ITEM_AMT/TOT_ITEM.TOT_AMT desc

SELECT BAS.F12506 ,BAS.F16012 ,BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.F15001 ,BAS.daily /* DAILY 수익률 */ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.1week, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Week1 /* 1WEEK 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.1month, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Month1 /* Month1 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.3month, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Month3 /* Month3 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.ytd, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS YTD /* YTD 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.1year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year1 /* Year1 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.3year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year3 /* YEAR3 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.5year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year5 /* YEAR5 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.10year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year10 /* Year10 수익률*/ FROM (SELECT base.F12506 ,'' as F16012 ,base.F16013 ,base.F16002 ,base.F15001 ,base.F15004 as daily /*daily 수익률*/ , @vF12506:= base.F12506 ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 1 week), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 1week ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 1month ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 3month ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.F12506, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS ytd ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 1year ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 3year ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 5 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 5year ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 10 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 10year from kc_etp.td_index_basic base WHERE base.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} AND base.market_id = #{market_id} ) BAS UNION ALL /* 총4개 까지 만 쿼리 */ SELECT BAS.F12506 ,BAS.F16012 ,BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.F15001 ,BAS.daily ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Week1, 2) as Week1 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Month1, 2) as Month1 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Month3, 2) as Month3 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.YTD, 2) as YTD ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year1, 2) as Year1 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year3, 2) as Year3 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year5, 2) as Year5 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year10, 2) as Year10 FROM (SELECT base.F12506 ,base.F16012 ,base.F16013 ,base.F16002 ,base.F15001 ,base.W00001 AS daily ,base.W00002 AS Week1 ,base.W00003 AS Month1 ,base.W00004 AS Month3 ,base.W00005 AS YTD ,base.W00006 AS Year1 ,base.W00007 AS Year3 ,base.W00008 AS Year5 ,base.W00009 AS Year10 FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic base WHERE base.F34239 = CAST(substr(#{market_id} , 2) AS SIGNED) AND base.F16257 = #{jisu_cd} ORDER BY base.W00003 DESC limit 0, 4 ) BAS

SELECT BAS.F12506 ,BAS.F16012 ,BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.F15001 ,BAS.daily /* DAILY 수익률 */ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.1week, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Week1 /* 1WEEK 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.1month, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Month1 /* Month1 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.3month, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Month3 /* Month3 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.ytd, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS YTD /* YTD 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.1year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year1 /* Year1 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.3year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year3 /* YEAR3 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.5year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year5 /* YEAR5 수익률*/ ,TRUNCATE((BAS.F15001 / ifnull(BAS.10year, BAS.F15001)) - 1, 2) AS Year10 /* Year10 수익률*/ FROM (SELECT base.F12506 ,'' as F16012 ,base.F16013 ,base.F16002 ,base.F15001 ,base.F15004 as daily /*daily 수익률*/ , @vF12506:= base.F12506 ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 1 week), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 1week ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 1month ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 3 MONTH), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 3month ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE DATE_FORMAT(a.F12506, '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS ytd ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 1year ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 3 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 3year ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 5 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 5year ,(SELECT F15001 FROM (SELECT a.F16013, a.F12506, a.F15009, a.market_id, a.F15001 , (CASE @vF16013 WHEN a.F16013 THEN @rownum:=@rownum+1 ELSE @rownum:=1 END) rnum , (@vF16013:= a.F16013) vF16013 FROM td_index_hist a INNER JOIN (SELECT @vF16013:='', @rownum:=0 FROM DUAL) b WHERE a.F12506 >= date_format(DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(@vF12506, '%Y.%m.%d'), INTERVAL 10 YEAR), '%Y%m%d') order BY a.F16013, a.F12506 ASC LIMIT 0, 2) A where A.rnum = 1 and A.F16013 = base.F16013 AND A.market_id = base.market_id) AS 10year from kc_etp.td_index_basic base WHERE base.F16013 = #{jisu_cd} AND base.market_id = #{market_id} ) BAS

SELECT BAS.F12506 ,BAS.F16012 ,BAS.F16013 ,BAS.F16002 ,BAS.F15001 ,BAS.daily ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Week1, 2) as Week1 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Month1, 2) as Month1 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Month3, 2) as Month3 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.YTD, 2) as YTD ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year1, 2) as Year1 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year3, 2) as Year3 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year5, 2) as Year5 ,TRUNCATE(BAS.Year10, 2) as Year10 FROM (SELECT base.F12506 ,base.F16012 ,base.F16013 ,base.F16002 ,base.F15001 ,base.W00001 AS daily ,base.W00002 AS Week1 ,base.W00003 AS Month1 ,base.W00004 AS Month3 ,base.W00005 AS YTD ,base.W00006 AS Year1 ,base.W00007 AS Year3 ,base.W00008 AS Year5 ,base.W00009 AS Year10 FROM kc_etp.td_etp_basic base WHERE base.F16012 = #{jisu_cd} ) BAS
SELECT COUNT(*) as count ,DATE_FORMAT(MAX(REG_TIME),'%Y/%m/%d') as updateDate FROM tm_jisu_share_req WHERE REQ_FLAG = '1'
SELECT COUNT(*) as count ,DATE_FORMAT(MAX(REG_TIME),'%Y/%m/%d') as updateDate FROM tm_jisu_mast WHERE STATUS = #{state};

SELECT @ROWNUM:=@ROWNUM+1 AS seq , td_index_basic.F16013 , td_index_basic.market_id , td_index_basic.F16002 AS name , td_index_basic.F15004 , td_index_basic.F15472 , td_index_basic.F15001
FROM (SELECT * FROM td_index_basic WHERE LARGE_TYPE = #{large_type} ORDER BY F16013 DESC LIMIT 0, 4 ) td_index_basic ,(SELECT @ROWNUM:=0) R
